name: Bleeding Abyss
description:
Your goal.

Run and survive the onslaught of the Ayaards.


Use your rewards to grow stronger, buy food and equipment.


Travel from statue to statue and try to escape.

What to expect.

  • Chaotic exhilarating fast-paced combat. With a hint of careful planning.
  • Multiple different enemies with unique movesets to conquer.
  • Plentifull of bosses to catch you off guard.
  • Level up, buy food, equipment and tools in order to conquer more ground.
  • Find out the mysteries of the underground and help everyone escape.
  • Easy to pick up. Hard to master.
  • Provides a good challenge.
